name: Mark Nicole John P. Nobleza
summary: Results-driven professional with extensive experience in real estate support, recruitment, client services, and customer relations. Adept at streamlining processes, enhancing client satisfaction, and delivering efficient solutions. Committed to building long-term partnerships, driving business success, and contributing to organizational growth.

description: Screen and endorse candidates to clients, providing detailed feedback on role suitability.
Conduct client presentations to highlight services and secure business partnerships.
Manage sales leads by scheduling meetings, preparing proposals, and processing contracts.
Handle arrears management by coordinating with clients on overdue accounts.
Maintain strong communication channels with clients and resolve hiring concerns efficiently.
Conducted tenancy application reference checks within 24 hours.
Processed and coordinated tenancy start payments and documentation.
Followed up with prospective tenants, ensuring applications and inspections were completed.
Prepared tenancy lease renewals, conducted periodic inspections, and generated monthly rent reviews.
Handled inbound/outbound calls and emails for reservations and ticketing inquiries.
Delivered solutions to customer issues, resolving complaints with professionalism.
Provided accurate product and service information to enhance customer experience.

additional_information: Dnata Travel Inc. (Etihad Airways) – Customer Service Associate
